articles.title: Jigsaw: A Google disinformation, toxicity, censorship and extremism control unit
articles.description: We build new experiments and research to tackle the most pressuring digital security challenges from censorship and harassment to disinformation and violent extremism.
articles.content:
Outline
Outline makes it easy to set up your own virtual private network (VPN) and share it with your network for safer, more resilient access to the open internet.
